name: Classic Watch
description: A timeless classic watch with a leather strap and analog display.

description: A modern digital watch with multiple features and water resistance.

name: Luxury Watch
description: A premium luxury watch with a gold-plated design and sapphire crystal glass.

description: A durable sports watch with GPS tracking and heart rate monitoring.

description: An advanced smartwatch with fitness tracking and smartphone connectivity.

name: Vintage Watch
description: A retro-styled vintage watch with unique craftsmanship and charm.

name: Diver's Watch
description: A professional diver's watch with water resistance up to 300 meters.

name: Fashion Watch
description: A stylish fashion watch perfect for casual or formal occasions.

name: Minimalist Watch

name: Hybrid Watch
description: A hybrid watch combining analog elegance with smart features.
